name: BallZ on Fire!
description:
Stay focus, be concentrate and tap the ballZ carefully through each obstacle, your ballZ pass through enemies, you get more points and you can share it with your friends.

Match the empty space pattern on each obstacle to cross it !

Be careful not to pass through the wrong space, or you’ll have to start again.

Game Features:
◉Free Game Balls to play
◉Endless GamePlay
◉Simple ball control
◉very challenging game
◉Multi scene editing
◉aerodynamic design
◉defeat your friends with the Best high score
